TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageContractAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MessageContractAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MessageContractAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義對應到 SOAP 訊息的強型別類別。

span.span: Defines a strongly-typed class that corresponds to a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 屬性指定特定訊息的 SOAP 封套結構。Use the attribute to specify the structure of the SOAP envelope for a particular message. 然後，您的服務便可將訊息當成服務作業中的參數或傳回型別使用。Your service can then use the message as a parameter or return type in service operations. 如需如何控制 SOAP 本文內容的序列化，而不需修改預設 SOAP 封套本身的資訊，請參閱， [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md)，和[使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For information about controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md), and [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). > [!NOTE] > 您無法在服務作業中透過一般的可序列化參數使用自訂訊息類型，You cannot use custom message types in your service operation with regular serializable parameters. 但可使用不是 物件的自訂訊息類型或可序列化參數。Either use custom message types or serializable parameters that are not objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱， [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md)。For details, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md). 若要實作某類型的訊息合約，請使用 加以標註，並且使用 、 或 標註一個或多個類別欄位或屬性。To implement a message contract for a type, annotate it with and annotate one or more of the class's fields or properties with , , or . > [!NOTE] > 不是訊息合約屬性，無法與 搭配使用。 is not a message contract attribute and cannot be used in conjunction with . 請使用 和 屬性指定 SOAP 訊息中 `` 項目的值。Use the and properties to specify the value of the `` element in the SOAP message. - 請使用 和 屬性指示 SOAP 訊息類型是否有保護層級，以及是哪一種層級 (如果有的話)。Use the and properties to indicate whether the SOAP message type has a protection level, and if so, what it is. - 請使用 屬性指示訊息本文是否有包裝函式項目，如果有的話，則使用 和 屬性分別指定包裝函式項目的名稱和命名空間。Use the property to indicate whether the message body has a wrapper element, and if so, use the and properties to specify the name and namespace, respectively, of the wrapping element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Using Message Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md)。For more information, see [Using Message Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 控制要求訊息和回應訊息的 SOAP 封套結構，並說明如何使用 建立回應訊息的 SOAP 標頭和使用 指定要求訊息和回應訊息的本文。The following code example shows the use of the to control the SOAP envelope structure for both the request message and the response message, and the use of both the (to create a SOAP header for the response message) and the (to specify the bodies of both the request and response message). 這個程式碼範例包含每個所傳送訊息的範例。The code example contains an example of each message when sent. [!code-csharp[MessageHeaderAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageHeaderAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/vb/services.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示訊息是否擁有保護層級。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the message has a protection level.

value.span: 如果訊息必須經過加密、簽署或兩者都要，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the message must be encrypted, signed, or both; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此設定為 `true`，則訊息的保護層級為 的值。If this setting is `true`, the protection level for the message is the value of . 如需保護層級及其假設和範圍的詳細資訊，請參閱[了解保護層級](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md)。For details about protection levels and their assumptions and scopes, see [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定訊息本文是否有包裝函式項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the message body has a wrapper element.

value.span: 如果訊息本文有包裝函式項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the message body has a wrapper element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將 的值設定為 `false`，隱藏訊息本文經過序列化之後成為的包裝函式項目。Set the value of to `false` to suppress the wrapper element into which the message body is serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需保護層級及其假設和範圍的詳細資訊，請參閱[了解保護層級](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md)。For details about protection levels and their assumptions and scopes, see [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 屬性設定包裝函式項目的名稱。Use the property to set the name of the wrapper element.

span.span: The value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 屬性設定包裝函式項目的命名空間。Use the property to set the namespace of the wrapper element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 控制要求訊息和回應訊息的 SOAP 封套結構，並說明如何使用 建立回應訊息的 SOAP 標頭和使用 指定要求訊息和回應訊息的本文。The following code example shows the use of the to control the SOAP envelope structure for both the request message and the response message, and the use of both the (to create a SOAP header for the response message) and the (to specify the bodies of both the request and response message). 這個程式碼範例包含每個所傳送訊息的範例。The code example contains an example of each message when sent.
